name: THE "DENPA" MEN: They Came By Wave
synopsis: The Denpa Men are mysterious creatures that float around radio waves in your daily environment. Catch the Denpa Men to form a party, which you can take on a variety of adventures in this fun, new Dungeon RPG! Each radio wave territory has its own unique Denpa Men. Go to many different places in real life to find Denpa Men with a great variety of skills, and go on an exciting adventure to save your loved one from the clutches of the King of Evil!
